screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Google search result for Indian restaurants in the Mountain View area. A map at the top displays restaurant locations with red markers. Below, three restaurants—Hyderabad Dum Biryani, Mantra India, and Zareen's Mountain View—are listed with ratings, distances, price ranges, and status (open or closed). Each listing includes a brief review and a thumbnail image of the food. At the bottom, there is a section titled "Find places through photos" showing food images.
